systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

provisioningState.Description: Provisioning state of the link at the time the operation was called

secrets.Description: The secret values for the given Mongo database resource

environment.Description: Fully qualified resource ID for the environment that the link is linked to

application.Description: Fully qualified resource ID for the application that the link is consumed by

username.Description: Username to use when connecting to the target Mongo database

password.Description: Password to use when connecting to the target Mongo database

connectionString.Description: Connection string used to connect to the target Mongo database

host.Description: Host name of the target Mongo database

port.Description: Port value of the target Mongo database

database.Description: Database name of the target Mongo database

recipe.Description: The recipe used to automatically deploy underlying infrastructure for a link

mode.Description: How to build the Mongo database link. Options are to build automatically via 'recipe' or 'resource', or build manually via 'values'. Selection determines which set of fields to additionally require.
